unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather is always messing with us farmers! Reminds me of 1992 when the monsoons failed in Maharashtra. My Kaka lost half his jowar crop near Nashik. Even last year, 2023, saw late rains. Will the Agri Dept. at IARI ever give us a reliable weather prediction system? Maybe by 2025? 06:00 hrs is when my dad starts worrying, especially if it looks cloudy! This is just like that Bollywood song, "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham..." But seriously, bad yields mean less money for Diwali and all.
normalised: Arre yaar, weather is always messing with us farmers! Reminds me of one thousand nine hundred and ninety two when the monsoons failed in Maharashtra. My Kaka lost half his jowar crop near Nashik. Even last year, two thousand and twenty three, saw late rains. Will the Agri Department at I A R I ever give us a reliable weather prediction system? Maybe by two thousand and twenty five? six zero zero hours is when my dad starts worrying, especially if it looks cloudy! This is just like that Bollywood song, "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham..." But seriously, bad yields mean less money for Diwali and all.
